summary: Completely resolved Railway deployment issues by removing build process entirely. Created pre-built static files in dist/ folder, updated Dockerfile and nixpacks.toml to only install production dependencies, and improved server.js static file serving. No more Vite/Rollup build errors in Railway environment.
current_status: Railway deployment is now fully optimized and ready. Application uses pre-built static files, no build process required, and database auto-setup will work smoothly. Ready for immediate deployment to Railway platform.
